title: [Large-scale] Language Proficiency Enhancement Through IVR-Based Group Inquiry Learning Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented language education environment for working professionals, utilizing IVR devices via the BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) approach

learning_goals: Learners can recreate real-world language use scenarios (e.g., meetings, presentations) and apply communication strategies through group collaboration in an IVR simulation environment
Learners enhance language learning immersion (presence) and perceived enjoyment by leveraging IVR technology characteristics (immersion, interactivity)
Learners can demonstrate advanced language skills required in real workplace environments (negotiation, problem-solving) through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
